scripts.start: export $(cat .env | xargs) && docker-compose up -d postgres && concurrently --names "Backend,Frontend" --prefix-colors "blue,yellow" "pnpm backend:start" "pnpm frontend:dev"
scripts.backend:start: cd backend && export $(cat ../.env | xargs) && WS_PORT=3003 bun server.ts
scripts.backend:dev: cd backend && export $(cat ../.env | xargs) && bun --watch server.ts
scripts.frontend:dev: cd frontend && export $(cat ../.env | xargs) && npx shadow-cljs watch app
scripts.build: cd frontend && export $(cat ../.env | xargs) && npx shadow-cljs release app && cd ../backend && bun build server.ts --outdir dist --target node
scripts.prod: export $(cat .env | xargs) && docker-compose up -d postgres && cd backend && WS_PORT=3003 node dist/server.js
